EmailTemplate.name: 11 UPDATE Notify Contac- Lead of OPT- OUT request completed ENGLISH
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
You recently confirmed to us that you would like to retain your Corian® registration in our database.
In line with that request, we have updated your information in our database(s) to keep your Corian® registration but you will no longer receive any mailings from us. We keep your contact details private.
Kind Regards,
{!User.Username}
